about_the_game:
Early Access

This game is still in development. I was on a bit of hiatus (life is crazy) but I am back and working diligently on bringing this game to release in Q3 2024 please wishlist!

Whether you decide to buy now, later, or never I appreciate you stopping by and giving me a chance to pitch my game to you!

Action Tower Defense

Geometry Defense: Infinite is mainly modeled after the WC3 tower defense mods and why mazing is a core part of the game. Some differences you will notice is that enemies cannot destroy towers and the speed of the game.

The design goal of GD is sort of "anti-TD" in that playing idly will be punished. My goal with each mechanic is to force player action and higher actions per minute (APM). Enemies are designed to annoy you and disable your towers in other ways. I understand this is not for everyone but there are many really great tower defense games out there if you want something more traditional.

The current Live version does not achieve this in a way that feels good but the next update (1.7) is aiming to change that with a massive balance overhaul, new enemies, new towers, and more.

Features

  • Amazing Gameplay - define the enemies path to maximize tower damage.
  • Cool Towers - with 3 levels and 2 upgrade paths.
  • Powerful Elements - damage types with different status effects.
  • Awesome Abilities - for dispatching foes that rush past your defenses.
  • Unique Enemies - give purpose to your towers and abilities.
  • Challenging Bosses - challenge your skill against these special enemies.
  • Expansive Research Lab - with tons of upgrades, improve nearly every stat.
  • Campaign Missions - defend the Sol System from the geometric invaders and unlock new abilities.
  • Endless Challenge - infinite/incremental waves with a variety of configurations using procedural wave generation.
  • Endless(er) Dev - chance to provide input and have a meaningful impact on the direction of the game.

short_description: Geometry Defense: Infinite is a classic infinite tower defense game where you must build a maze to slow enemies and build towers to destroy them. An action-packed and engaging game requiring focus to take on challenges and test your skill.
